description: Retrieves details about a policy store.

parameters.name: policyStoreId
parameters.description: Specifies the ID of the policy store that you want information about.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return the tags that are attached to the policy store. If this parameter is included in the API call, the tags are returned, otherwise they are not returned.

nested_items.name: policyStoreId
nested_items.description: The ID of the policy store;

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the policy store.

nested_items.name: validationSettings
nested_items.description: The current validation settings for the policy store.

nested_items.name: mode
nested_items.description: The validation mode currently configured for this policy store. The valid values are:

nested_items.name: createdDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that the policy store was originally created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that the policy store was last updated.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: Descriptive text that you can provide to help with identification of the current policy store.

nested_items.name: deletionProtection
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the policy store can be deleted. If enabled, the policy store can't be deleted.

nested_items.name: cedarVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the Cedar language used with policies, policy templates, and schemas in this policy store. For more information, see Amazon Verified Permissions upgrade to Cedar v4 FAQ.
